EmailTemplate.subject: Love tech? You’ll love this offer!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View Online <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/default.aspx?cmp=EBBSFEB2019&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> FREE Shipping* <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/default.aspx?cmp=EBBSFEB2019&utm_source={{my.UTM%20Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Love Is In The Air
Fallen for a printer, laptop or other tech product? Why not save $25 OFF** your next order when you spend $100 or more.
Use Code: <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/category/_/N-1z0crxh?cmp=EBNEWPRODUCTSEN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> 1902BS25 <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/Account/Logon?cmp=EBBSFEB2019EN&&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Logitech M310 - mouse $35.86
Shop Now <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/product/910676_Logitech_M310_-_mouse_-_2_4_GHz_-_silver.aspx?cmp=EBBSFEB2019&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Logitech Wireless Wave Combo MK550 - keyboard and mouse set $87.99
Shop Now <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/product/920807_Logitech_Wireless_Wave_Combo_MK550_-_keyboard_and_mouse_set_-_English.aspx?cmp=EBBSFEB2019&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Dell E2318H - LED monitor $154.99
Shop Now <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/product/IM2312DQ_Dell_E2318H_-_LED_monitor_-_Full_HD_(1080p)_-_23.aspx?cmp=EBBSFEB2019&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Top membership features include: FREE Shipping* Exclusive Discounts No Annual Membership Fee Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx?cmp=EBTERMS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx?cmp=EBPRIVACY2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1-866-391-8111
*Free Shipping applies to orders of $50 or more. Minimum purchase required before taxes and after discounts. Orders outside our local delivery area, oversized and special order items do not qualify. Non-qualifying orders incur a shipping charge based on order size, weight and delivery location (minimum charge of $9.95). Other restrictions apply. See grandandtoy.com/terms or call 1-866-391-8111 for details.
**Must sign in to your account in order to use the promo code. Offer valid at www.grandandtoy.com only. Enter promo code 1902BS25 at checkout. Not valid on special furniture orders. Void if copied, sold, purchased, transferred, taxed or where prohibited. Cannot be combined with any other coupon, associate discount, or any other offers. Offer not valid on prior purchases or for credit card payments. No cash or credit back. Open to Canadian residents only. Cash value .001¢. Offer expires February 28, 2019.
